mapper.sql: SELECT LOT_ID AS lotId, CLASSES_CODE AS classesCode, CLASSES_NAME AS classesName, MACHINING_CODE AS machiningCode, MACHINING_NAME AS machiningName, BREED_CODE AS breedCode, BREED_NAME AS breedName, IFNULL(FEATURE_CODE,'') AS featureCode, IFNULL(FEATURE_NAME,'') AS featureName, WEIGHT_CODE AS weightCode, WEIGHT_NAME AS weightName, GRADE_CODE AS gradeCode, GRADE_NAME AS gradeName, SL_CODE AS slCode, SL_NAME AS slName, PD_CODE AS pdCode, PD_NAME AS pdName, PKG_CODE AS pkgCode, SL_CODE_DIS AS slCodeDis, IFNULL(SL_CODE_MANUFACTURE,'') AS slCodeManufacture, SALES_PLATFORM AS salesPlatform, IFNULL(LGCS_CODE,'') AS lgcsCode, DATE_CODE AS dateCode, IFNULL(LGCS_NAME,'') AS lgcsName, case when IFNULL(PD_STATUS,'') = 1 then '申请中' when IFNULL(PD_STATUS,'') = 2 then '论证中' when IFNULL(PD_STATUS,'') = 3 then '禁止准入' when IFNULL(PD_STATUS,'') = 4 then '试销' when IFNULL(PD_STATUS,'') = 5 then '正式上线' when IFNULL(PD_STATUS,'') = 6 then '下线' when IFNULL(PD_STATUS,'') = 7 then '黑名单' when IFNULL(PD_STATUS,'') = 8 then '缺货中' ELSE '' end AS pdStatus, IFNULL(ORIGIN,'') AS origin, IFNULL(PRODCINGAREA,'') AS prodcingArea, MANUFACTURER AS manufacturer, BRAND AS brand, IFNULL(NETWEIGHT,'') AS netWeight, IFNULL(PKG_SPEC,'') AS pkgSpec, IFNULL(PKG_WAY,'') AS pkgWay, IFNULL(PD_TIME,'') AS pdTime, IFNULL(SHELF_LIFE,'') AS shelfLife, IFNULL(PROCESSING_WAY,'') AS processingWay, IFNULL(STORAGE_WAY,'') AS storageWay, CRT_TIME AS crtTime
